text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the T-shirt with a different outfit (Variant (b) 'crazy sunglasses' and Variant (c) 'worker-rights activist outfit') would be considered a copyright violation in Italy as a derivative work. Section 3.2, under the 'Determine the Legal Theory for Each Variant' table, explicitly addresses Variant (b) as 'Derivative work (Art. 6\u2011c, 6\u2011d). Still infringement because the underlying protected expression is copied.' It also addresses Variant (c) as 'Derivative work (still infringing).' This directly satisfies the requirement.", "criterion_id": "2d540ecf-880a-4df6-8b5a-d31b31a03448"}
